---
title: "Data visualization in R with the ggplot2 package"
author: "Angelika Merkel"
---

This workshop introduces the ggplot2 R package for data visualization ( course presentation available [here](data/Data_visualization_with_ggplot2.pdf))

**Topics covered:**

* Why ggplot2?
* Base R and the tidyverse
* Building up your plot with ggplot()
* Aestetics and geoms
* Types of plots for one, two or multiple numerical/categorical variables

For this course we follow the Chapter: 'Data visualization' in the book [R for Data Science (2nd edition)](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/) by Wickham et al. This includes the practical session and exercises.
